attributes.action: introduce emergency legislation to ban the companies owning the oil tankers currently anchored off the south coast of this country from ever being allowed to have one of their ships enter any UK port.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These companies are holding us to ransom.  The people of this country would rather walk and freeze to death than enrich the people who are holding us to ransom.  Let the people vote and tell these people to go to hell.
